title: Tiebreaker issue
body: Honestly, there should be a tiebreaker game between BJK and the Chiefs to determine who goes to the semi-finals but fucking Riot had to out BJK in semis although they both went 3-3. Explain how this is fair towards the Chiefs?

replies.body: BJK beat chiefs in the round robin, so the tiebreaker is decided by that, rather than playing a tiebreaker game.

^^Pretty much this

I think like this type of system, i think an actual game should of been played as a tie breaker but that's the way the tournament was organised..
